dcterms:description: The FMA dataset is used for music genre classification and contains 25,000 tracks from 5,152 unique albums, with genre annotations provided by users.

dcterms:description: Essentia is a music feature extraction library that provides song-level feature vectors ranging from low-level spectral characteristics to high-level features.
dcterms:title: Essentia
